list_definition.definition: to criticize or blame loudly and angrily

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She scolded the child for coming home so late.

list_ex_of_english: Instead of dutifully keeping his mouth shut when instructed or scolded, he answered back with unbecoming impunity.
